Nikita Chepchumba Kering, onye a maara dịka Nikita Kering, bụ onye Kenya na-eti egwu, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye mgbasa ozi.
A mụrụ ya na February 26th, 2002 na Nairobi, Kenya
Ọ gara Riara Springs Academy, Kilimani Junior Academy na Brookhouse International School ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ A-level ya site na agụmakwụkwọ, nke e nyere iji kwado ọrụ egwu ya.
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya mgbe ọ dị obere
N'afọ 2012, n'oge mmeghe album nke Emmy Kosgey, ọ bụrụ abụ nye ọtụtụ ndị na-ege ntị, ma bụrụ onye a ma ama maka arụmọrụ ya
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ndekọ na EmPawa Africa ma họrọ ya ka ọ gaa ọzụzụ na usoro ndụmọdụ mba ụwa
Nikita ghọrọ onye ikpeazụ n'oge asọmpi ahụ, mana e weere ya dịka onye na-eto eto ịsọ mpi na ọkwa kachasị elu; n'agbanyeghị nke ahụ, o mere ka ọ pụta ìhè.
